info.title: Essentials
info.description: Search GuideStarâ€™s most common set of data about nonprofits to quickly find organizations most relevant to your users, and use those results to get more data from our other APIs. API returns search result in JSON format.

post.description: Find nonprofits using variable search criteria and explore essential information.

requestBody.description: Below JSON request body is an example showing all available elements. Please use the examples from the API Documentation.

post.description: Find nonprofits using variable search criteria and explore essential information.

requestBody.description: Below JSON request body is an example showing all available elements. Please use the examples from the API Documentation.

post.description: Make your searches more relevant and real-time with access to new filters and fields.

requestBody.description: Below JSON request body is an example showing all available elements. Please use the examples from the API Documentation.

get.description: Use the /lookup endpoint to retrieve a list of the tables that can be passed as a filter_name to the lookup detail endpoints. The tables and their contents can be used to generate dropdowns and filters in your system when using the Essentials API.

Provides a list of all the human-readable search values within a specific filter_name table, which can then be used in search queries with the Essentials endpoints. Each array contains a table key, name value, and search value. The resulting search_value(s) can be passed as search values in the Essentials API.
Lookup details on a specific filter using the known filter_name and key_or_value.  The resulting search_value can be passed as a search value in the Essentials API.

parameters.name: filter_name
parameters.description: A list of all filters that can be used in Essentials endpoints. Found in the response of /essentials/lookup.

parameters.name: key_or_value
parameters.description: Key of filterable items. Found in the response of /essentials/lookup/{filter_name}

search_terms.description: Can be any string you'd like to search on, including EIN, organization name, keywords, etc.

from.description: The offset from the first result. Defaults to 0.

size.description: The maximum number of hits to be returned. Defaults to 25. The maximum number allowed is 25.

search_terms.description: Can be any string you'd like to search on, including EIN, organization name, keywords, etc.

from.description: The offset from the first result. Defaults to 0.

size.description: The maximum number of hits to be returned. Defaults to 25. The maximum number allowed is 25.

sort_by.description: Leave blank to sort by relevance.

ascending.description: Default value is true (ascending). Set to false to sort by descending value.

sort_by.description: Leave blank to sort by relevance.

sort_order.description: Default value is ascending. Allowed values are "asc" (ascending) and "desc" (descending).

radius.description: Radius from the specified ZIP code in miles. Allowed range is between 1 and 50 miles. Values exceeding 50 will default to a radius of 50 miles.

ntee_major_codes.description: National Taxonomy of Exempt Entities (NTEE) major codes, comma separated.

ntee_minor_codes.description: National Taxonomy of Exempt Entities (NTEE) minor codes, comma separated.

subsection_codes.description: IRS subsection codes and/or descriptions, comma separated.

foundation_codes.description: Foundation codes and/or descriptions, comma separated.

bmf_status.description: Flag indicating the organization has the most recent IRS BMF. Defaults to null. Otherwise true or false.

pub78_verified.description: Flag indicating the organization is pub78 verified. Value set as true or false.

ntee_major_codes.description: National Taxonomy of Exempt Entities (NTEE) major codes, comma separated.

ntee_minor_codes.description: National Taxonomy of Exempt Entities (NTEE) minor codes, comma separated.

subsection_codes.description: IRS subsection codes and/or descriptions, comma separated.

foundation_codes.description: Foundation codes and/or descriptions, comma separated.

ruling_year.description: Range specifying the year the granted organization tax exempt status (a.k.a. Ruling Year)

bmf_status.description: Flag indicating the organization has the most recent IRS BMF. Defaults to null. Otherwise true or false.

pub78_verified.description: Flag indicating the organization is pub78 verified. Value set as true or false.

allow_online_giving.description: Flag indicating the organization allows online giving. Value set as true or false.

dei_submitted.description: Flag indicating the organization has submitted demographics information. Value set as true or false.

exclude_revoked_organizations.description: Flag to exclude revoked organizations. Value set as true or false.

exclude_defunct_or_merged_organizations.description: Flag to exclude defunct or merged organizations. Value set as true or false.

f990.description: Flag indicating the organization files a form 990. Value set as true or false.

f990pf.description: Flag indicating the organization files a form 990-PF. Value set as true or false.

f990ez.description: Flag indicating the organization files a form 990ez. Value set as true or false.

f990n.description: Flag indicating the organization files a form 990n. Value set as true or false.

required_to_file_990t.description: Flag indicating the organization is required to file a 990-T. Value set as true or false.

a_133_audit_performed.description: Flag indicating the organization performed A-133 audit. Value set as true or false.

parent.description: Flag indicating the organization is a parent. Value set as true or false.

subordinate.description: Flag indicating the organization is a subordinate. Value set as true or false.

independent.description: Flag indicating the organization is independent. Value set as true or false.

headquarter.description: Flag indicating the organization is a headquarter. Value set as true or false.

start_date.description: A filter, along with end_date, defines a range on date_type, in the format yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.

end_date.description: A filter, along with start_date, defines a range on date_type, in the format yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.

date_type.description: A filter, to specify updates made to a organization over the specified end_date and start_date.

took.description: Time taken for request to process

total_hits.description: Number of results returned by search

organization_id.description: A unique number identifying organizations and organizational entities

organization_name.description: The public name recognized by the IRS

zip.description: Zip code of the organization's address

msa.description: Metropolitan statistical area of the organization's adresss

lat_long.description: latitude and longitude of the organization's adress
